about_the_game: A musical journey through the years of Automation - The Car Company Tycoon Game, composed by Micheal Trott. Starting in 1941 and concluding in 2019, the soundtrack covers all kinds of musical styles. Common themes bind together the great musical variety of the 25 tracks with almost two hours of playtime.
